attributes.action: scrap Ofcom advertising rules that brand cheese a "junk food"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cheese is clearly a healthy part of our diet, and like many things in life, good for you in moderation. This ban is counterproductive and could put people off eating a food which has many beneficial qualities for healthy living.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "scrap Ofcom advertising rules that brand cheese a "junk food"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14288.asp

Prime Minister's Office
